sen.j: 見仏寺（けんぶつじ）は、奈良県宇陀市に所在する日蓮正宗の寺院。
sen.e: Kenbutsu-ji Temple, located at Uda City in Nara Prefecture, is the temple of Nichiren Shoshu sect of Buddhism.
Kenbutsu-ji Temple, located at Uda City in Nara Prefecture, is the temple of Nichiren Shoshu sect of Buddhism.
Kenbutsu-ji Temple, located at Uda City in Nara Prefecture, is the temple of Nichiren Shoshu sect of Buddhism.

sen.j: 山号は一心山（いっしんさん）。
sen.e: Its honorific mountain prefix is Isshinsan.
Its honorific mountain prefix is Isshinsan.
Its sango (literally, "mountain name"), which is the title prefixed to the name of a Buddhist temple, is Isshinsan.

sen.cmt: 文頭のみ大文字にしました。

sen.j: 1981年（昭和56年）3月10日 - 建立される。
sen.e: The temple was erected on March 10 in 1981.
The temple was erected on March 10 in 1981.
The temple was erected on March 10, 1981.
sen.cmt: 日付表記統一しました。

sen.j: 開基は日蓮正宗大石寺第67世法主日顕上人。
sen.e: Kaiki (patron of a temple in its founding) is Nikken Shonin who is the 67th head priest of Nichiren Shoshu Taiseki-ji Temple,
